items.title: Pollock's key hit rewards Ray's stellar start
items.summary: A.J. Pollock delivered for the third straight game, this time knocking a two-run double in the seventh to give the D-backs a 3-2 win over the Giants on Friday night at AT&T Park.
items.content: A.J. Pollock delivered for the third straight game, this time knocking a two-run double in the seventh to give the D-backs a 3-2 win over the Giants on Friday night at AT&T Park.

alternate.title: Pollock's key hit rewards Ray's stellar start

items.title: Indians, fans savor magical run as streak ends
items.summary: After Francisco Lindor struck out, bringing an end to the Indians' incredible and historic winning streak, the Cleveland crowd rose to its feet and roared. Rare is the defeat that is followed with a standing ovation, but the fans in attendance understood the magnitude of this moment.
items.content: After Francisco Lindor struck out, bringing an end to the Indians' incredible and historic winning streak, the Cleveland crowd rose to its feet and roared. Rare is the defeat that is followed with a standing ovation, but the fans in attendance understood the magnitude of this moment.

alternate.title: Indians, fans savor magical run as streak ends

items.title: Indians believe Ramirez is making MVP case
items.summary: After Indians second baseman Jose Ramirez crossed home plate and returned to the Indians' dugout following his two-run homer in the third inning of Friday night's game against the Royals, chants of "M-V-P" echoed throughout Progressive Field.
items.content: After Indians second baseman Jose Ramirez crossed home plate and returned to the Indians' dugout following his two-run homer in the third inning of Friday night's game against the Royals, chants of "M-V-P" echoed throughout Progressive Field.

alternate.title: Indians believe Ramirez is making MVP case
